alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Eastern Windham; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 06 at 6:24AM EST until January 07 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches with locally higher amounts up to 15 inches. * WHERE...Mohawk and Schoharie Valleys, Capital Region, southern Vermont, Lake George and Saratoga Regions and the Southern Adirondacks. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to snow covered roadways and reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates around one inch per hour at times for Saturday evening into early Sunday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
